text:
More than adequate. 59 GB free on the Surface 3's 128 GB eMMC 'disk' - beyond
W10 Pro 22H2 just Office 2019, Edge, Chrome, Firefox, Acronis 2020, Macrium
Reflect, iTunes, Windows Live PhotoGallery, Irfanview and Zoom. Note: Data(all
Photos, Music, Office documents, Program installers, Surface drivers(Firmware,
Msi) and OneDrive local synced folders are on the 128GB SDXC media card) The
SDXC card has 56 GB free space. Only two Windows logons(Microsoft Account[MSA]
and Local - both admin). Those two logons combined, entire 'Userprofile' folders
total 5.3 GB. and that includes the MSA's Outlook.pst(2.1 GB) file on the 128 GB
eMMc. - i.e. she/it is a pretty lean machine.

metadata.topic: Win11 22h2 and later - they don't need 250 free? Yes? No? and what about checking if you are patched? (aka I'm confused)
metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Win11 22h2 and later - they don't need 250 free? Yes? No? and what about checking if you are patched? (aka I'm confused)
metadata.email_text_original:
More than adequate. 59 GB free on the Surface 3's 128 GB eMMC 'disk' - beyond
W10 Pro 22H2 just Office 2019, Edge, Chrome, Firefox, Acronis 2020, Macrium
Reflect, iTunes, Windows Live PhotoGallery, Irfanview and Zoom. Note: Data(all
Photos, Music, Office documents, Program installers, Surface drivers(Firmware,
Msi) and OneDrive local synced folders are on the 128GB SDXC media card) The
SDXC card has 56 GB free space. Only two Windows logons(Microsoft Account[MSA]
and Local - both admin). Those two logons combined, entire 'Userprofile' folders
total 5.3 GB. and that includes the MSA's Outlook.pst(2.1 GB) file on the 128 GB
eMMc. - i.e. she/it is a pretty lean machine. -----Original Message----- From:
patchmanagement@googlegroups.com On Behalf Of Shawn K. Hall Sent: January 27,
2024 9:41 AM To: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com Subject: RE: [patchmanagement]
Win11 22h2 and later - they don't need 250 free? Yes? No? and what about
checking if you are patched? (aka I'm confused) How much free space was on C: ?
-S
Link: None
